title: Nemanja Ivanović
text:
Nemanja Ivanović (; born 14 May 1997) is a <a href="Serbia">Serbia</a>n professional <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Striker%20%28association%20football%29">striker</a>, who plays for <a href="FK%20Mladost%20Lu%C4%8Dani">Mladost Lučani</a> in the <a href="Serbian%20SuperLiga">Serbian SuperLiga</a>.
Career.
Ivanović is a product of <a href="Red%20Star%20Belgrade">Red Star Belgrade</a> youth sportive school. 
In January 2019, Ivanović signed a two years contract with <a href="FC%20Zorya%20Luhansk">FC Zorya Luhansk</a> from the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
